task_name: Exploring Agentic AI in Business Automation

task_stages.stage_name: Foundations of Agentic AI in Business
task_stages.stage_details: Understand what Agentic AI is, why it matters for business automation, and identify key beginner concepts and terminology.

quiz.question: Agentic AI is best described as AI that _____.
options: A. Passively returns search results only
B. Acts autonomously to pursue goals and make decisions
C. Requires constant human coding for each action
D. Only analyzes historical data without acting

quiz.question: Which capability is a hallmark of Agentic AI?
A key business benefit of Agentic AI is _____.
options: C. Converting PDFs to Word docs

quiz.question: In the sense-plan-act loop, the “plan” step mainly involves _____.
options: B. Choosing a sequence of actions toward a goal
D. Sending raw logs to storage

quiz.question: Which industry is often cited as an early adopter of Agentic AI for customer engagement?

task_stages.stage_name: Beginner Tools for Agentic AI and Automation
task_stages.stage_details: Get hands-on with beginner-friendly tools for Agentic AI, including low-code platforms, Microsoft Copilot, and simple Python frameworks.

quiz.question: Microsoft Copilot is primarily integrated into _____.
options: B. Microsoft 365 apps like Word and Excel

quiz.question: Low-code platforms help beginners by _____.
options: B. Providing visual drag-and-drop workflow builders

quiz.question: The n8n tutorial demonstrates creating a workflow that _____.
options: B. Connects APIs and automates tasks without heavy coding

quiz.question: Which Python framework is mentioned for building simple AI agents?
A key advantage of beginner-friendly agent tools is _____.
options: B. Quick prototyping with minimal code

task_stages.stage_name: Real-World Business Use Cases and Case Studies
task_stages.stage_details: Discover how businesses are applying Agentic AI for customer service, support, and workflow optimization. Learn from practical examples and measurable outcomes.

quiz.question: A common KPI improved by Agentic AI chatbots is _____.
options: B. Number of paper forms printed

quiz.question: In case studies, ROI is often demonstrated by _____.
Which sector showed significant cost savings with AI support agents?
Agentic AI can escalate complex cases to humans via _____.
options: A. Automated transfer or hand-off logic

quiz.question: One highlighted benefit of AI agents in support is _____.

task_stages.stage_name: Building Your First Agentic AI Workflows
task_stages.stage_details: Apply your knowledge by building simple Agentic AI workflows using beginner-friendly tools and frameworks. Learn basic Python automation and explore agent frameworks like LangChain.

quiz.question: LangChain helps developers by providing _____.
options: A. A framework for chaining LLM calls and tools
C. A database migration tool only

quiz.question: A simple agent workflow often starts with _____.
options: A. Defining the agent’s goal or task

quiz.question: When integrating Python scripts in an automation, you typically use _____.
options: A. Code nodes or Python SDK

quiz.question: Which video resource demonstrates building and selling AI agents?
To identify tasks to automate, experts recommend _____.
